page.title: 13Industrial work of the area
page.content: The main industry in the area is gypsum processing.Gypsum is no longer extracted here,in one case because of being 'worked out' and in the other because it was uneconomic.There is however still one plant which processes gypsum,extracted from outside the area.This is prepared for base products in cosmetics etc.Much is also prepared for building work in the powdered form and also made into plasterboard for lining walls.More rural industry is carried out at Thoroton where there is extensive egg production,these being mechanically sorted,sized and packed for selling. At Shelton and Alverton there are horticultural concerns in 1 case for raising coniferous trees and in the other for growing of shrubs for sale. At Flawborough a consumer research firm tests food and drink for humans.
